channel.title: Waitless Games on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Waitless Games on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Creature Quellector
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Creature Quellector. In this devlog, I’ll briefly describe the process, problems I faced, how I solved them, why I made certain decisions, yada yada.

item.title: Finger Food
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Finger Food. I’ll (briefly) explain the design process for the game. Where did the idea come from? How did I develop it? What interesting problems did I have to solve?

item.title: Foldigami
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my game Foldigami. Here, I’ll (briefly) explain the design process for the game. Where did the idea come from? How did I develop it? What interesting problems did I have to solve?
